New Records: Mark Vientos became the youngest player in National League history to have three extra-base hits in a postseason game
Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos walked off Philadelphia after Mark Vientos tied the game in the top of the ninth
The Phillies scored in the bottom of the ninth to win the game 7-6
Mark Vientos hit a two-run home run in the ninth inning to tie the game
Post-Match Reflections: The series is now tied 1-1 with Game 3 at Citi Field on Tuesday
The Mets are returning home after a long absence
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a wild back-and-forth affair with multiple lead changes
The series is tied 1-1 heading into Game 3
Others: Francisco Alvarez threw out Bryson Stott for an out at home
Pete Alonso hit an opposite-field home run in the sixth inning
